item.description:
Friday nights should be a good time to share a few laughs and drinks with friends and what better way to do it than hanging out at a Comedy Club. Motleys Club was voted Best of 09 by Phoenix magazine(No idea what the heck that is but who cares).

Myq Kaplan is the featured comic for the day and there will be several others. You can find more info about him at

http://www.myqkaplan....

You can also reserve your tickets online for $20

http://www.mottleysco...

Please make sure to buy tickets for Myq Kaplan performance on 10/02/2009. It almost sounds like I am promoting the guy, but really not, just trying to make sure you get tickets for the right show since there are a few lined up. Please update the discussion board once you have bought the ticket.

After the show for those who are interested we can hang out at a local bar/club/lounge whatever.

Discount parking is available at 75 State Street Garage, you can print out a coupon from Comedy Clubs website.Closest T stop would be State Street on Orange line/ Blue Line, you can walk from there in about 5-7 mins Please get there at least half and hour early.

Karan
item.name: Mottley's Comedy Club!!!
